verses.roman:
vīraś candro 'śvasenaś ca
citragur vegavān vṛṣaḥ
āmaḥ śaṅkur vasuḥ śrīmān
kuntir nāgnajiteḥ sutāḥ

synonyms: vīraḥ candraḥ aśvasenaḥ ca—Vīra, Candra and Aśvasena; citraguḥ vegavān vṛṣaḥ—Citragu, Vegavān and Vṛṣa; āmaḥ śaṅkuḥ vasuḥ—Āma, Śaṅku and Vasu; śrī-mān—opulent; kuntiḥ—Kuntī; nāgnajiteḥ—of Nagnajitī; sutāḥ—the sons.
translation: The sons of Nāgnajitī were Vīra, Candra, Aśvasena, Citragu, Vegavān, Vṛṣa, Āma, Śaṅku, Vasu and the opulent Kunti.
